name: Unifi, Inc.
description: Unifi, Inc. is a leading global manufacturer of synthetic and recycled yarns, providing innovative solutions for the textile and apparel industries. Founded in 1972 and headquartered in Greensboro, North Carolina, Unifi has established itself as a pioneer in the production of high-quality yarns made from both virgin and recycled materials. The company is committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship, utilizing advanced technologies to create products that reduce waste and promote circularity in the textile supply chain. Unifi's product portfolio includes a diverse range of offerings, such as polyester, nylon, and specialty yarns, which are widely used in activewear, home furnishings, and other textile applications. The company's REPREVE® brand is particularly noteworthy, as it highlights Unifi's commitment to recycling and sustainability by transforming discarded plastic bottles into high-performance fibers. Unifi continuously invests in research and development to enhance its product offerings and meet the evolving needs of its customers. With a focus on quality, innovation, and sustainability, Unifi, Inc. plays a crucial role in shaping the future of the textile industry.
